channel.title: Budget laptop good choice ?
channel.description:
Greetings all, I'm a fan of the old Half-Life game (1998) and I haven't got the chance to play HL2 yet. I'm looking to buy a budget laptop that I will be using for my work but I also want to play HL2, the two following episodes and maybe other HL2 based games like HL Source and CS/DoD and of course Black Mesa :smiley: . Besides these games I don't think I'm going to play any others. Do you mind giving your opinion about the laptop I plan to buy ? Here are the specs: Asus X42JY-VX094D Intel Pentium P6200 (2.13 Ghz, 3MB L3 cache) HM55 Express Chipset ATI Radeon Mobility HD 6470 1 GB VRAM 2 GB DDRIII RAM ... Do you think I will be able to play HL2 and its mods with the highest graphics ? I think the graphic card of this config is ok but my concern is about the processor though one would say it doesn't really matter when it comes to play games ?!
Cheers!

item.title: Budget laptop good choice ?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
CP stands for Control Panel, don’t listen to anyone who says otherwise.

CTID:

That’s an odd laptop, really. The GPU in it is actually fairly recent and good, but the processor looks around 5 years old. Why they’d put a Pentium 4 2.13 ghz in a new laptop is beyond me.

WRONG

it’s a core i3/5/7 series rebranded for $$$

CPUWorld:
Integrated dual-channel DDR3 SDRAM Memory controller
Direct Media Interface
Integrated HD graphics controller

That thing should run Black Mesa full speed on high detail, same for Portal 2, etc.
